You can create an UpDownGapThreeMethods Candlestick Pattern indicator that requires manual update. The following reference table describes the UpDownGapThreeMethods constructor.

   )

Definition at line 48 of file CandlestickPatterns/UpDownGapThreeMethods.cs.


You can update the indicator automatically or manually.

Automatic Update

Create a consolidator and then call the RegisterIndicator method to update the indicator with the consolidated bars.

using QuantConnect.Indicators.CandlestickPatterns;

private UpDownGapThreeMethods _updowngapthreemethods;

// In Initialize()
_updowngapthreemethods = new UpDownGapThreeMethods(name);
_updowngapthreemethods.Updated += IndicatorUpdateMethod;

var thirtyMinuteConsolidator = new TradeBarConsolidator(TimeSpan.FromMinutes(30));
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
SubscriptionManager.AddConsolidator(symbol, thirtyMinuteConsolidator);

RegisterIndicator(symbol, _updowngapthreemethods, thirtyMinuteConsolidator);

// In IndicatorUpdateMethod()
if (_updowngapthreemethods.IsReady)
{
    var indicatorValue = _updowngapthreemethods.Current.Value;
}
from QuantConnect.Indicators.CandlestickPatterns import UpDownGapThreeMethods
    
# In Initialize()
self.updowngapthreemethods = UpDownGapThreeMethods(name)
self.updowngapthreemethods.Updated += self.IndicatorUpdateMethod

thirty_minute_consolidator = TradeBarConsolidator(timedelta(minutes=30))
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.SubscriptionManager.AddConsolidator(symbol, thirty_minute_consolidator)

self.RegisterIndicator(symbol, self.updowngapthreemethods, thirty_minute_consolidator)

# In IndicatorUpdateMethod()
if self.updowngapthreemethods.IsReady:
    indicator_value = self.updowngapthreemethods.Current.Value

Manual Update

Updating your indicator manually enables you to control when the indicator is updated and what data you use to update it. To manually update the indicator, call the Update method that with a TradeBar. The indicator will only be ready after you prime it with enough data.

using QuantConnect.Indicators.CandlestickPatterns;
    
private UpDownGapThreeMethods _updowngapthreemethods;
private Symbol symbol;

// In Initialize()
_updowngapthreemethods = new UpDownGapThreeMethods();
symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;

// In OnData()
if (data.Bars.ContainsKey(_symbol))
{
    _updowngapthreemethods.Update(data.Bars[symbol]);
}
if (_updowngapthreemethods.IsReady)
{
    var indicatorValue = _updowngapthreemethods.Current.Value;
}
from QuantConnect.Indicators.CandlestickPatterns import UpDownGapThreeMethods
    
# In Initialize()
self.updowngapthreemethods = UpDownGapThreeMethods()
self.symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol

# In OnData()
if data.Bars.ContainsKey(self.symbol):
    self.updowngapthreemethods.Update(data.Bars[self.symbol])
if self.updowngapthreemethods.IsReady:
    indicator_value = self.updowngapthreemethods.Current.Value
